Options.Name: defaults
Options.Description: When true, disables interactive input prompts for options with a default.

Options.Name: dry-run
Options.Description: When true, run through and report activity without writing out results.

Options.Name: force
Options.Description: When true, force overwriting of existing files.

Options.Name: interactive
Options.Description: When false, disables interactive input prompts.

Name: add
Description: Adds support for an external library to your project.

Options.Name: aot
Options.Description: Build using Ahead of Time compilation.

Options.Name: base-href
Options.Description: Base url for the application being built.

Options.Name: build-optimizer
Options.Description: Enables @angular-devkit/build-optimizer optimizations when using the 'aot' option.

Options.Name: common-chunk
Options.Description: Use a separate bundle containing code used across multiple bundles.

Options.Name: configuration
Options.Description: A named configuration environment, as specified in the 'configurations' section of angular.json.

Arguments.Name: project
Arguments.Description: The name of the project to build. Can be an app or a library.

Name: build
Description: Compiles an Angular app into an output directory named dist/ at the given output path. Must be executed from within a workspace directory.

Options.Name: global
Options.Description: When true, accesses the global configuration in the caller's home directory.

Arguments.Name: jsonPath
Arguments.Description: The configuration key to set or query, in JSON path format. For example: 'a[3].foo.bar[2]'. If no new value is provided, returns the current value of this key.

Arguments.Name: value
Arguments.Description: If provided, a new value for the given configuration key.

Name: config
Description: Retrieves or sets Angular configuration values.

Options.Name: search
Options.Description: When true, searches all of angular.io. Otherwise, searches only API reference documentation.

Arguments.Name: keyword
Arguments.Description: The keyword to search for, as provided in the search bar in angular.io.

Name: doc
Description: Opens the official Angular documentation (angular.io) in a browser, and searches for a given keyword.

Options.Name: base-url
Options.Description: Base URL for protractor to connect to.

Options.Name: configuration
Options.Description: A named configuration environment, as specified in the 'configurations' section of angular.json.

Options.Name: dev-server-target
Options.Description: Dev server target to run tests against.

Options.Name: element-explorer
Options.Description: Start Protractor's Element Explorer for debugging.

Options.Name: host
Options.Description: Host to listen on.

Arguments.Name: project
Arguments.Description: The name of the project to build. Can be an app or a library.

Name: e2e
Description: Builds and serves an Angular app, then runs end-to-end tests using Protractor.

Options.Name: defaults
Options.Description: When true, disables interactive input prompts for options with a default.

Options.Name: dry-run
Options.Description: When true, run through and report activity without writing out results.

Options.Name: force
Options.Description: When true, force overwriting of existing files.

Options.Name: interactive
Options.Description: When false, disables interactive input prompts.

Arguments.Name: schematic
Arguments.Description: The schematic or collection:schematic to generate.

Name: generate
Description: Generates and/or modifies files based on a schematic.

Options.Name: configuration
Options.Description: Specify the configuration to use.

Options.Name: exclude
Options.Description: Files to exclude from linting.

Options.Name: files
Options.Description: Files to include in linting.

Options.Name: fix
Options.Description: Fixes linting errors (may overwrite linted files).

Options.Name: force
Options.Description: Succeeds even if there was linting errors.

Arguments.Name: project
Arguments.Description: The name of the project to lint.

Name: lint
Description: Runs linting tools on Angular app code in a given project folder.

Options.Name: collection
Options.Description: Schematics collection to use.

Options.Name: commit
Options.Description: Initial repository commit information.

Options.Name: create-application
Options.Description: Flag to toggle creation of an application in the new workspace.

Options.Name: directory
Options.Description: Specify

Options.Name: dry-run
Options.Description: When true, run through and report activity without writing out results.

Name: new
Description: Creates a new workspace and an initial Angular app.

Options.Name: configuration
Options.Description: Specify the configuration to use.

Name: run
Description: Runs a custom target defined in your project.

Options.Name: aot
Options.Description: Build using Ahead of Time compilation.

Options.Name: base-href
Options.Description: Base url for the application being built.

Options.Name: browser-target
Options.Description: Specify

Options.Name: common-chunk
Options.Description: Use a separate bundle containing code used across multiple bundles.

Options.Name: configuration
Options.Description: A named configuration environment, as specified in the 'configurations' section of angular.json.

Arguments.Name: project
Arguments.Description: The name of the project to build. Can be an app or a library.

Name: serve
Description: Runs a custom target defined in your project.

Options.Name: browsers
Options.Description: Override which browsers tests are run against.

Options.Name: code-coverage
Options.Description: Output a code coverage report.

Options.Name: code-coverage-exclude
Options.Description: Globs to exclude from code coverage.

Options.Name: configuration
Options.Description: A named configuration environment, as specified in the 'configurations' section of angular.json.

Options.Name: environment
Options.Description: Defines the build environment.

Arguments.Name: project
Arguments.Description: The name of the project to build. Can be an app or a library.

Name: test
Description: Runs unit tests in a project.

Options.Name: all
Options.Description: Whether to update all packages in package.json.

Options.Name: force
Options.Description: If false, will error out if installed packages are incompatible with the update.

Options.Name: from
Options.Description: Version from which to migrate from. Only available with a single package being updated, and only on migration only.

Options.Name: migrate-only
Options.Description: Only perform a migration, does not update the installed version.

Options.Name: next
Options.Description: Use the largest version, including beta and RCs.

Name: update
Description: Updates your application and its dependencies. See https://update.angular.io/

Options.Name: browser-target
Options.Description: Target to extract from.

Options.Name: configuration
Options.Description: A named configuration environment, as specified in the 'configurations' section of angular.json.

Options.Name: i18n-format
Options.Description: Output format for the generated file.

Options.Name: i18n-locale
Options.Description: Specifies the source language of the application.

Options.Name: out-file
Options.Description: Name of the file to output.

Arguments.Name: project
Arguments.Description: The name of the project to build. Can be an app or a library.

Name: xi18n
Description: Extracts i18n messages from source code.
